remarks: Induction step for constructing a substitution instance of ~ ax-c15 without using ~ ax-c15 .  Quantification case.  (When ` z ` and ` y ` are distinct, ~ ax12inda2 may be used instead to avoid the dummy variable ` w ` in the proof.)  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ax12inda.1 $e |- ( -. A. x x = w -> ( x = w -> ( ph -> A. x ( x = w -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
ax12inda $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( x = y -> ( A. z ph -> A. x ( x = y -> A. z ph ) ) ) ) $.
$d ph w $.
$d w x $.
$d w y $.
$d w z $.
